info.title: SaaS Boilerplate
info.description: API documentation for the SaaS Boilerplate.

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description: External account linking and management for OAuth providers

tags.name: Invitation
tags.description: Organization invitation management including sending, accepting, and canceling invites

tags.name: Membership
tags.description: Organization membership management with role-based access control

tags.name: Organization
tags.description: Organization management including creation, updates, verification, and statistics

tags.name: Integration
tags.description: Third-party integration management with installation, configuration, and lifecycle control

tags.name: User
tags.description: User profile management with membership tracking and account operations

tags.name: Webhook
tags.description: Comprehensive webhook management with event subscription and real-time notifications

tags.name: Session
tags.description: User session management with active session tracking and token revocation

tags.name: Plan
tags.description: Subscription plan management and pricing information

tags.name: Billing
tags.description: Subscription billing management with checkout sessions and customer portal access

tags.name: Submission
tags.description: Manage form submissions and lead data

tags.name: Admin
tags.description: Administrative operations for organizations and users

get.summary: List all external accounts linked to current user

post.summary: Link a new external OAuth account to user profile

delete.summary: Remove an external OAuth account from user profile
